entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Assiniboia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Assiniboia Airport 04:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: -13.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -21

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
